description: Health Department inspection results for food service establishments in King County,  2006 to the present. This data is organized by Business / Inspection Date / Violation. Each row in this dataset is an inspection, and if an inspection at a particular buiness results in multiple violations there will be multiple rows for that business with the same Inspection_Serial_Num. This dataset was last Updated on 03/30/2015 and is current from 1/1/2006 to 03/27/2015.
